name: Captain Flying Robot
description:
Gamebread Now Presents, the ultimate racing extravaganza. Future is robot as Iron body costume with extra NOS. Lets see how good your reflexes are.

How To Play:

Use Arrow Keys to change direction & speed. But be careful not to crash

Dodge in the endless traffic on procedurally generated asphalt tracks. Each gameplay is going to be a new experience

Captain Flying Robots Features:

- ENDLESS space city Venture
- UNLOCK cool Hovercraft
- Easy SWIPE controls
- Crazy CRASHES
- extreme graphics
- almost impossible challenges
- rich and random tracks
- extensive car tuning
- fast traffic racing action

Product of Gamebread
